data.content:
noun
plural ~ -ages
[count] something that looks like something else but with its left and right sides reversed
The left hand and the right hand are mirror images (of each other). = The left hand is the/a mirror image of the right hand.
The left side of the building is a mirror image of the right.
someone who looks like someone else
He's the mirror image [=(more commonly) spitting image] of his father. [=he looks just like his father]

Danh từ
hình trong gương (bên trái nhìn hoá thành bên phải và ngược lại)
